EmailTemplate.name: Approval for Price change
EmailTemplate.subject: Price Change request for {!Sales_Agreement_Product_Price__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Sales_Agreement_Product_Price__c.CreatedBy} has requested your approval for the following price change in Salesforce
To approve or reject this item, click this link : {!Sales_Agreement_Product_Price__c.Link}
You can also reply to this email with one of the following words in the first line of the email body: APPROVE, APPROVED, YES, REJECT, REJECTED, NO
If replying via email you can also add comments on the second line. Comments will be stored with the approval request in Salesforce.
Thank you, Imerys Salesforce Team
